item.description:
Hello Coffee Talk,

For those of you who are interested, we will meet for coffee and dessert at the Starbucks Cafe in the Barnes & Noble in North Haven, CT at 6 pm and then walk over to Rave Motion Pictures at 7 pm to see "Identity Thief".  I saw the previews and it looks like the movie would be hysterical.  It appears to be all things juvenile, entertaining, hilarious and also sweet.  For those of you that have not had a good laugh in quite a while, please join me for a comedy and for some good adult laughs at the movies on the 16th.

Coffee Location and Time:  6pm - Starbucks Cafe at the Barnes & Noble Booksellers in North Haven, CT

Movie Location and Time:  7pm - Rave Motion Pictures, North Haven, CT

Cheers,

Swadhi

 

A.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2024432/

www.imdb.com/title/tt2024432/

B.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Identity_Thief

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Identity_Thief
item.how_to_find_us: At the Starbucks Cafe that is to the right of the entrance, once you enter the Barnes & Noble.
item.name: Coffee Talk @ Coffee & Comedy "Identity Thief"
